story.title: Flipping the Mattress - Episode 1
story.storyDescription: Callie has needs -- and a proposition for Zain involving her mattress. But how long can this Neighbors With Benefits situation last?
story.creator: web-uploader
story.prePaywallNotification: OMG! What are Callie and Zain going to do in her bedroom? Keep reading FLIPPING THE MATTRESS to find out üòö‚ù§Ô∏è
story.postPaywallNotification: Ready to see how Zain returns the favor for Callie? Read Episode 2 of FLIPPING THE MATTRESS.

messages.text: Hey, this is your neighbor. I live in Apartment 12G.
The doorman said to get in touch with you?
Yes, I‚Äôve seen you around.
And I have a proposition for you.
Believe me, I‚Äôve seen you around too!
So‚Ä¶what do you need?
It‚Äôs more like I have needs.
What kind of needs?
You see, I just bought a bed.
You did? That‚Äôs interesting.
One side is soft and the other is firm.
And they delivered it with the soft side up.
But I prefer the firm!
Firm is better, I always say.
It‚Äôs too heavy for me to lift on my own.
So could you come over and help me flip the mattress?
And in return I‚Äôll‚Ä¶
You‚Äôll what?
I‚Äôll let you try it out with me.
If you know what I mean.
I think I DO know what you mean.
And that seems like a fair exchange‚Ä¶
For my superior mattress-flipping abilities.
I‚Äôll be over soon.
Great!
Fifteen minutes later there‚Äôs a knock at Callie‚Äôs door.
It‚Äôs Zain, wearing a tight t-shirt and shorts.
His muscular biceps and calves are on delectable display.
His black wavy hair is a little damp from the shower he clearly just took.
Callie catches a whiff of his subtle aftershave.
Zain from Mattress Flippers Inc. at your service, ma‚Äôam.
Callie, wearing a black camisole and short black skirt, ushers him in.
Thank god you‚Äôre here.
I wasn‚Äôt going to be able to get through the night with my mattress like this.
I could tell it was a mattress emergency.
That‚Äôs why I came right down.
Can you show me the mattress?
I need to know if I‚Äôll need any special equipment.
Callie‚Äôs eyes look Zain up and down.
And stop in the middle.
You‚Äôll definitely need special equipment.
But it looks like you already have it with you.
The bedroom is this way.
Callie leads Zain to the bedroom and her queen-size bed.
She pulls back the covers and sinks down on the mattress.
Sit down and you‚Äôll see what I mean.
Zain sits next to Callie and bounces on the mattress.
He appears to give its firmness level some serious consideration.
Yes, it‚Äôs definitely way too soft.
You need something harder.
A LOT harder.
Thank goodness it‚Äôs much harder on the other side.
Yes. I‚Äôm glad I can make it hard for you.
Callie removes the sheets and pillows from the bed so the mattress is bare.
You stand at the foot of the bed and I‚Äôll stand over here.
Grab the mattress and bend at your knees.
Are you ready?
Ready!
Flip!!
In one fluid movement,
As if they‚Äôve been doing this their whole lives,
Zain and Callie succeed in flipping the mattress.
They high-five each other.
Okay, time to try it out.
Callie sits and bounces on the bed.
Oh, I think this is MUCH better.
Tell me what YOU think.
Then, very slowly, he grazes her arm with one fingertip.
The contact sends shivers up Callie‚Äôs spine.
It‚Äôs what I told you from the start.
Firmer is better.
Callie looks into Zain‚Äôs eyes.
Her hands are traveling down to his zipper.
You know‚Ä¶firmer IS better.
The she reaches over to her nightstand and pulls out a condom.
And now it‚Äôs time for me to repay you for your excellent service.
She gives Zain a long, lustful kiss and he pulls her down onto the mattress.
Two hours later Callie and Zain are lying under the covers.
Their heads are on the pillows that Callie has returned to the bed.
They are exhausted‚Ä¶ and deeply satisfied.
That was‚Ä¶
What?
Amazing.
I know.
You are an excellent mattress flipper.
So are you! It was a team effort.
There‚Äôs just one problem.
What?!
I feel so guilty.
Why?
I ended up getting TWO great services.
I mean, my ‚Äúpayment‚Äù to you didn‚Äôt feel like a payment at all.
Because I enjoyed it so much.
Hmmmm. I see your point.
What do you think we can do about that?
I was thinking‚Ä¶
I fix computers for a living.
If your computer ever happens to go on the blink,
I‚Äôd be happy to come and take a look at it.
That‚Äôs great. Because It just so happens that I have a very old computer.
And things are constantly going wrong with it.
Oh really?
Yes, so I‚Äôll definitely let you know if I need you to fix it.
And in return, I‚Äôll‚Ä¶
